Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express & #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/95th
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express & 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 95th, Ave L, 100th & Ewing, due to street blockage near Ewing/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express & #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ewing, 95th, Ave L, 100th & Ewing, due to street blockage near Ewing/95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Western
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 51st, California and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Western

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Western, 51st, California and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Western

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Clark/Division
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Clark/Division due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Clark/Division due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
